Pre-Game Insights: The 76ers are expected to break their losing streak tonight.
The game should be a great opportunity for the team's big three to shine and secure a victory.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cam Johnson scored 26 points in the win but sustained an injury.
The Nets have one of the league's worst defenses.
Others: The 76ers have a long climb ahead in the standings, especially after a blowout loss to the Golden State Warriors in their last game.
The Nets are in rebuilding mode, recently trading Dennis Schroder and Dorian Finney-Smith for assets.
